channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2023090398
item.description:
Report X-2023090398

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-02
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was being unloaded from trailer and package handler found that the package was leaking. package handler notified manager of leaking hazmat. DescribePack: The lids were broken to 3 containers. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: As soon as the package arrived to QA it was placed on the grate to prevent further leakage on the floor. Then placed inside the salvage drum. to prevent further leakage.
